attributes.additional_details: The payment and what it serves is neither explained nor fair.

rejection.details:
We understand you want the TV license fee to be scrapped, however it's not clear whether you want to still be able to watch the BBC through an optional subscription, or you want BBC services to be funded in some other way.

You might like to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597886
